# Element Alignment and Spacing

Modify the alignment and spacing between elements.

## Element Alignment

- **text-align**: Aligns text horizontally in an element.
- **tv-align**: Aligns an element horizontally inside its parent.
- **tv-content-align**: Aligns an element vertically inside its parent element.
- **tv-position**: Sets the position of an element inside of its parent element.

## Element Spacing

- **margin**: Specifies the spacing around an element.
- **padding**: Specifies the padding between the border and contents of an element.
- **tv-focus-margin**: Specifies the amount of space required for a custom cell element in focus.
- **tv-interitem-spacing**: Specifies the spacing between child elements.
- **tv-line-spacing**: Specifies the amount of space between lines of text.

## Styles

- **Color Styles**: Provide the ability to customize an element’s color.
- **Text Styles**: Change the text characteristics for an element.
- **Element Shaping**: Modify the size and shape of an element.
- **tv-placeholder**: Sets a default image for an `img` or `monogram` element.
- **tv-rating-style**: Sets the displayed image for rating a product.
- **tv-transition**: Specifies how an element transitions on and off the screen.
- **tv-text-highlight-style**: Specifies how an element looks when it comes into focus.
- **tv-scrollable-bounds-inset**: Creates an unscrollable region of a specified size at the top and bottom of the stack template.
